catalyst: The catalyst used in the experiment is NiO-In₂O₃/TiO₂, with indium (In) and nickel (Ni) doped onto a TiO₂ (titanium dioxide) support. Specific doping levels varied (e.g., 3.5 wt.% In and 0.5–2 wt.% Ni for co-loaded catalysts).
co_catalyst: The co-catalyst used in the experiment is nickel (Ni) and indium (In) co-doped on TiO₂, specifically referred to as NiO-In₂O₃/TiO₂.
